title: Siege on the Sanctum
goal: The Sanctum is under direct attack by the Shadow Blight, possibly orchestrated or aided by Valerius.

beats.summary: They arrive at the Sanctum to find it under siege, its ancient defenses strained, its walls breached by the relentless tide of the Shadow Blight.
Chaos reigns as Sages fight desperately, their numbers dwindling, their magical defenses crumbling under the onslaught.
Kaelen, Lyra, and Seraphina plunge into the fray, their unique skills crucial in turning the tide against the corrupted forces.
They witness Valerius's faction either fighting alongside the attackers or exploiting the chaos, their betrayal laid bare for all to see.
